title: Useful Tips for 2 year + toddlers!
content:
TIPS AND TOYS YOU CAN USE FOR 2 YEAR + TODDLERS

- Make any counting you do with children fun. Sing or chant the numbers. Help them to pat or touch thing as you count them.

- Try – with patience – to answer your child’s many questions.

- Try not to provide contradictory talks to your child. The more accurate you are in your talking, the clearer your child’s mindset will develop.

- Remember your child records everything you say. The more you say it, the quickest he will remember what it means.

- You should always correct your child gently so that she/he does not feel ashamed.
Children still enjoy playing with simple, homemade toys. They do not need store-bought toys. 

- Children can learn to draw with chalk on a stone or with a stick in the sand.

- You can make puzzles by cutting magazine or simple pictures into large pieces.

- Children can learn to match colours, shapes, and sizes with simple objects, such as bottle caps. 

- Seed stacking: Get a wide piece of timber and a stick (the stick should not be sharp or thin). Glue the stick on the board. Collect 5 to 10 seeds of different lengths and sizes. Poke a hole in one end of each seed, and color each differently. 

- Building blocks.

- Beads and chains: You can make it out of wild fruits and nuts.
